info.name: Henderson Tallboy 6 Drawer
info.LongDescription:
OVERVIEW
There are no handles or knobs to disturb the clean lines and graceful proportions of the Henderson one-drawer side table. Its simple functional design provides a perfect storage solution in the bedroom or living room, and the characteristic shadowline around the bevelled-edged drawer is a design detail repeated throughout the Henderson range. 
Individually crafted, the bedside table features solid chestnut timber and timber veneers which show off a softly hued natural grain. Attractive and sturdy, this bedside table is part of Henderson’s coordinated furniture range, a range that is perfectly suited to a chic, contemporary style of decor.
“The simple design and natural grained timber of the Henderson range is  as close as it comes to a true Australian style,” Freedom  sofa buyer.
info.description: There are no handles or knobs to disturb the clean lines and graceful proportions of the modern suburban Henderson range of bedroom, dining and living room furniture. Each piece is individually crafted and displays a characteristic shadowline recessed on bedheads or around bevelled-edged drawers. Fine chestnut timber veneers in the Henderson tallboy show off a softly hued natural grain and the simple functional design is evident in the many storage solutions on offer. Attractive and durable, Henderson furniture is perfect for a chic, contemporary room setting that is suited to a coordinated look.
